text: The First Wives Club is a 1996 American comedy movie based on the novel of the same name by Olivia Goldsmith. It was directed by Hugh Wilson and produced by Scott Rudin. It was written by Robert Harling and Paul Rudnick. It is narrated by Diane Keaton and stars her, Goldie Hawn and Bette Midler. The movie is about three middle-aged divorced women who take revenge on their ex-husbands, who left them for young women. == Other websites == * Category:1996 comedy movies Category:1990s buddy movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:English-language movies Category:Female buddy movies Category:Feminist movies Category:Movies about divorce Category:Movies about revenge Category:Suicide in movies Category:Movies set in Manhattan Category:Movies based on books
title: The First Wives Club
